verses.verse: Now after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> it came to pass <S%H3068><s%>, that the Lord spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, Moses <S%H4872><s%>' minister <S%H8334><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> is dead <S%H4191><s%>; now therefore arise <S%H6965><s%>, go over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, you <S%H5971><s%>, and all this people, unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I do give <S%H5414><s%> to them <S%H1121><s%>, even to the sons of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Every place <S%H4725><s%> that the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> shall tread upon <S%H1869><s%>, that have I given <S%H5414><s%> to you <S%H1696><s%>, as I said unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

From the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and this Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> even unto the great <S%H1419><s%> river <S%H5104><s%>, the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>, all the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and unto the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> toward the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, shall be your coast <S%H1366><s%>.

There shall not any man <S%H376><s%> be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life <S%H2416><s%>: as I was with Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so I will be with you <S%H7503><s%>: I will not fail you <S%H5800><s%>, nor forsake you.

Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of good courage <S%H553><s%>: for to this people <S%H5971><s%> shall you divide for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, which I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give them <S%H5414><s%>.

Only be strong <S%H2388><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> courageous <S%H553><s%>, that you may observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all the law <S%H8451><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H5493><s%>: turn not from it to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>, that you may prosper <S%H7919><s%> wherever you go <S%H3212><s%>.

This book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> shall not depart <S%H4185><s%> out of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>; but you shall meditate <S%H1897><s%> in it day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>, that you may observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in it <S%H6743><s%>: for then you shall make your way <S%H1870><s%> prosperous <S%H6743><s%>, and then you shall have good success <S%H7919><s%>.

Have not I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H2388><s%>? Be strong and of a good courage <S%H553><s%>; be not afraid <S%H6206><s%>, neither be dismayed <S%H2865><s%>: for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is with you wherever you go <S%H3212><s%>.
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%>, and command <S%H6680><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Prepare <S%H3559><s%> food <S%H6720><s%>; for within three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall pass over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, to go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

And to the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and to half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, spoke <S%H559><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Remember <S%H2142><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H559><s%>, saying, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given you rest <S%H5117><s%>, and has given <S%H5414><s%> you this land <S%H776><s%>.

Your wives <S%H802><s%>, your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and your cattle <S%H4735><s%>, shall remain <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>; but you shall pass <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> armed <S%H2571><s%>, all the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men of valor <S%H2428><s%>, and help them <S%H5826><s%>;

Until the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5117><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> rest <S%H5117><s%>, as he has given you <S%H3423><s%>, and they also have possessed the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H7725><s%>: then you shall return unto the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H3425><s%>, and enjoy <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H4872><s%>, which Moses the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s servant <S%H5650><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%>.

And they answered <S%H6030><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, All that you command <S%H6680><s%> us we will do <S%H6213><s%>, and wherever <S%H834><s%> you send <S%H7971><s%> us <S%H3212><s%>, we will go.

According as we listened <S%H8085><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in all things <S%H8085><s%>, so will we listen unto you <S%H3068><s%>: only the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> be with you <S%H4872><s%>, as he was with Moses.

Whoever <S%H376><s%> he be that does rebel <S%H4784><s%> against your commandment <S%H6310><s%>, and will not listen <S%H8085><s%> unto your words <S%H1697><s%> in all that you command <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H4191><s%>, he shall be put to death: only be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of good courage <S%H553><s%>.
